sent.orig: The safety-conscious, alternates with rest, the few spot worry, the few spots worry.
sent.trans: 注意安全、劳逸结合，少点担心，少点牵挂。

sent.orig: Singin: dont worry about a thing - I wont worry!
sent.trans: 唱啊：不该担心的事情，我惯于担心！

sent.orig: Don't worry people understanding you, worry about understanding others.
sent.trans: 不患人之不己知，患不知人也。

sent.orig: Not someone makes me worry, but I get someone to worry oneself of words.
sent.trans: 不是某人使我烦恼，而是我拿某人的言行来烦恼自己。

sent.orig: If you worry about something, try to put your worry on the back burner.
sent.trans: 假如你为某事烦恼，设法把烦恼扔在一边，暂时不理。
